DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to describe the 24-hour urine output including the urinary excretion of hormones, electrolytes and other osmotically active substances in healthy children age 0 to 3 years old.
DOC.brief_title: The Circadian Rhythm of Urine Output in Healthy Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to describe the 24-hour urine output including the urinary excretion of hormones, electrolytes and other osmotically active substances in healthy children age 0 to 3 years old.
DOC.criteria: Healthy children, free of medication History of urinary diseases
